view_camera: This array holds the unique camera ID assigned to the given view port, and can be set to a new camera or read to get the current camera, returning -1 if no camera is assigned. You can have up to 8 view ports active in a room (array values 0 through 7), and can assign a camera to any of them by simply setting this variable to the camera ID value (as returned by the functions camera_create() or camera_create_view()). If you have set the camera to a view port through the Room Editor, this variable will hold the camera ID for that port.
Camera index or -1 if no camera is assigned
